title: "Shiny Graphs"
output: html_document
runtime: shiny

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
MessiRonaldoComplete <- read_csv("MessiRonaldoComplete.csv")
```

```{r}
fluidPage(
  fluidRow( 
    column(width = 3,   
        wellPanel(                
          # data widget: selecting the variables 
          selectInput("x_5", label = "x-axis Variable:",
             choices = c("Appearances" ="",
                         "Goals" = "life_expectancy",
                         "Assists" = "population"), 
             selected="income"),
          selectInput("y_5", label = "y-axis Variable:",
             choices = c("Income" ="income",
                         "Life expectancy" = "life_expectancy",
                         "Population" = "population"), 
             selected="life_expectancy")
        )
      ),
    column(width = 8, 
             plotOutput("gap_plot_5",hover="hover_coord_5")
      )
    ),
  fluidRow(
      column(width = 12, 
             tableOutput("hover_data_5")
      )
  )
)

# render plot
output$gap_plot_5 <- renderPlot({
  ggplot(gapminder, aes_string(x = input$x_5, y = input$y_5)) + 
    geom_point() + 
    theme(axis.text=element_text(size=16),
          axis.title=element_text(size=16) )
})
## render text for hovered point(s)
output$hover_data_5 <- renderTable({
   nearPoints(gapminder, input$hover_coord_5)[,1:6]
  })
```
